Here's an example algorithm using LaTeX:

\begin{algorithm}
\caption{Example Algorithm}
\begin{algorithmic}[1]
\REQUIRE $n \geq 0$
\ENSURE $y = x^n$
\STATE $y \leftarrow 1$
\FOR{$i = 1$ to $n$}
\STATE $y \leftarrow y \times x$
\ENDFOR
\RETURN $y$
\end{algorithmic}
\end{algorithm}
